PTA Income per Student, by School

10 out of the 23 CB7 schools raise

over $500 per student through the PTA.

The greatest amounts raised by CB 9 and

10 respectively were $273.13 and $175.65.

Over half of the schools in CBs 9 and 10

provide less than $10 per student through

the PTA, with 7 providing no funding.

CB7 (Upper West Side)

CB9 (West Harlem)

CB10 (Central Harlem)

Graphic by Devon Campbell, Andrew Park

PTA Income per student by school

10 out of the 23 CB7 schools raise over $500 per student through PTA. The greatest amounts raised by CB9 and CB10 respectively were $273.13 and $175.65

Over half of the schools in CBs 9 and 10 provide less than $10 per student through the PTA, with seven providing no funding
